title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.22 - Valuation schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 50.22 - Valuation schedule

State Regulations
(a) Within 10 business days after any
valuation date, the mutual trust investment company shall cause to be prepared
a schedule of investments, as of the valuation date, which shall contain: (1)
a description of each security issue or
investment; (2)
its face
value; (3)
its value as carried on
the books of the mutual trust investment company; and
(4)
its value as determined as of such
valuation date. (b) Each
such schedule shall be certified by one or more of the members of the board of
directors of the mutual trust investment company and filed as a permanent
record of the mutual trust investment company. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
50.22

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
